attributes.action: Reintegrate Public Transport and make it affordable and accessible once again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purposes of this petition is to call upon government to sort out the public transport mess. Global warming seems to be a fact and we are constantly being called upon to reduce carbon emissions without being given a credible alternative to using personal transport. Buses and rail need to be reintegrated into a national/regional network offering affordable fares and  accessibility. Significant public investment needs to take place in the infrastructure and take public transport out of the hands of the profit makers.
